snippet: Summary:  Stocks were little changed as investors discount dismal hiring in December; homebuilders rally as debt yields tumble; Target security breach bigger and wider than first revealed.  Conway G. Gittens reports....

headline.sub: Stocks flat as job growth stalls
headline.main: Stocks flat as job growth stalls

lead_paragraph: Summary:  Stocks were little changed as investors discount dismal hiring in December; homebuilders rally as debt yields tumble; Target security breach bigger and wider than first revealed.  Conway G. Gittens reports.
